description:
While fighting one of Baelgard`s four guardians, Xecty, Kiriya is trapped in an underground cavern with her. Elsewhere, Souma and his group meet Elwyn, an old friend of Zero`s. Together they stumble upon a lab that turns the contaminated elves  into soldiers. Leading the lab is none other then Hiruda, can Souma fight his friend?
Source: crunchyroll
